attributes.action: provide more funds to NHS to support women and their families affected by Miscarriages and early baby loss
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To provide access to counselling and support services though the NHS immediatley following miscarriage/ early baby loss to each and very women and their families.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "provide more funds to NHS to support women and their families affected by Miscarriages and early baby loss."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14744.asp

Prime Minister's Office
